text: Ezɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God uan akam inigha izir gumaziba amangizɨ, me vaghvagha Israel ko Judan ghuegha, kamaghɨn Akar Gavgavim me ganɨga ghaze, “Ia nɨghnɨzibagh iragh, egh ia uan arazir kuraba ategh nan Akar Gavgaviba, ko arazir kɨ ifongezibar gɨn mangɨ. Arazir kaba, kɨ ian inazir afeziabagh anɨngi. Kɨ akar kaba isa, uan ingangarir gumazibar akabagh atɨzɨ, me ia mɨkeme, kar nan akam inigha izir gumaziba.”
